He tries to run away but panics and falls."},{"lineNumber":264404,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぶざまに転ぶ","translatedEnglishLine":"Falls clumsily."},{"lineNumber":264405,"originalJapaneseLine":"しまった・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Damn it..."},{"lineNumber":264406,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス、チャンス","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance, it's your chance."},{"lineNumber":264407,"originalJapaneseLine":"倒れたケイブリスに迫った時、誰かが間に入った","translatedEnglishLine":"When approaching the fallen Cavebris, someone intervened."},{"lineNumber":264408,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔物大元帥ストロガノフが立ち塞がる","translatedEnglishLine":"               Demon Grand Marshal Stroganoff stands in the cut it."},{"lineNumber":264415,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中、このラウンドの後、倒せなくてもストロガノフは寿命となる","translatedEnglishLine":"During battle, after this round, even if not defeated, Stroganoff will reach his lifespan limit."},{"lineNumber":264416,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":264417,"originalJapaneseLine":"くらっ・・どうやら、これが最期になりそうだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh... it seems this is going to be my end."},{"lineNumber":264418,"originalJapaneseLine":"我が最期の一撃、正々堂々と受け止めてもらいたい","translatedEnglishLine":"I want you to receive my final strike fairly and lost to humanity, beating up fools who say we are overwhelmingly winning."},{"lineNumber":264435,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t　戦いは終わったんだよ、大将ケイブリスが敗れたんだ。俺達の負けだ","translatedEnglishLine":" army."},{"lineNumber":264438,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t藤原石丸、ＭＭルーン、かっての英雄達がなし得なかった事をついにランスが成し遂げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"               Fujihara Ishimaru, MM Rune, and past heroes could not achieve likely feels displeased."},{"lineNumber":264442,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t何か対策を取らねばと思っていたらクルックーだが、","translatedEnglishLine":"               Kruukoo thought something needed to be done, but,"},{"lineNumber":264443,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t不思議な事に天使ＡＬＩＣＥはニッコリしている","translatedEnglishLine":"               Interestingly, the angel ALICE is smiling."},{"lineNumber":264444,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tクルックーは何か不吉な物を感じる","translatedEnglishLine":"               Kruukoo senses something happen after this and thinks the excitement is just beginning.)"},{"lineNumber":264446,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t空飛ぶランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"               The flying Lance Castle."},{"lineNumber":264447,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tビスケッタさんがお迎えしてくれる、おつかれさまでした。","translatedEnglishLine":"               Biscetta-san welcomes you, thank you for your hard work."},{"lineNumber":264448,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tどうなされますか、お食事ですが、お風呂も用意出来ています、またご希望な方を","translatedEnglishLine":"               What would you like? Meals are ready, and a bath is prepared. It's nothing to do with you."},{"lineNumber":264456,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tシィルと和やかなシーン（この後、悲劇が来るので）","translatedEnglishLine":"               A peaceful scene with Silk (because a tragedy comes after this)."},{"lineNumber":264457,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tさて・・これからどうするかな、やる事なくなっちまったか。","translatedEnglishLine":"               Now then... what should I do from here? I’ve run out of things to do."},{"lineNumber":264458,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t前に駄目と言われましたけど、私・・ランス様の子供が欲しいです","translatedEnglishLine":"               I was told no before, but... I want Lance-sama’s child."},{"lineNumber":264459,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tいらんと言っているだろうが、まったく。","translatedEnglishLine":"               I said I don’t want that, seriously."},{"lineNumber":264460,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tまぁいい、１回だけチャンスをやろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"               Well, fine. I’ll give you one chance."},{"lineNumber":264461,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tがんばります。とか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"               I’ll do my best. Or something like that..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、お前はしねー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, you die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いかん、撤退だ・・と逃げようとするが、あわてて転ぶ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No good, retreat... He tries to run away but panics and falls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぶざまに転ぶ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Falls clumsily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しまった・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、チャンス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, it's your chance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒れたケイブリスに迫った時、誰かが間に入った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When approaching the fallen Cavebris, someone intervened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大元帥ストロガノフが立ち塞がる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Grand Marshal Stroganoff stands in the way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 刺さった剣を引き抜く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pulls out the embedded sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中、プレイヤー側が防御で守りに入って防いだ後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During battle, after the player side defends and protects.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が余命がつきるまで、そうやって守りに入って逃げ切る気かな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you planning to keep defending and escape until my remaining life runs out?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し残念そうな態度がいいかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A slightly disappointed attitude might be good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このあたりは性格に合わせて、語らない方が良さそうだったらカットします
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Around here, depending on the personality, if it seems better not to speak, I will cut it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中、このラウンドの後、倒せなくてもストロガノフは寿命となる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During battle, after this round, even if not defeated, Stroganoff will reach his lifespan limit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くらっ・・どうやら、これが最期になりそうだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... it seems this is going to be my end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が最期の一撃、正々堂々と受け止めてもらいたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want you to receive my final strike fairly and squarely.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフは死んだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff has died.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてケイブリスが本気になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then Cavebris gets serious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス死にます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cavebris dies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後の戦局
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The subsequent state of the battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍と人類の戦いは終わった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The war between the demon army and humanity has ended.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラの指示
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Camilla's instructions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後の戦局
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The subsequent state of the battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍と人類の戦いは終わった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The war between the demon army and humanity has ended.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラの指示
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Camilla's instructions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリスを倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeated the demon Cavebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界地図をバックに情報中心に表示
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Displayed mainly information against the background of the world map.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回の戦いで死んだ兵力、人民の数、魔軍の被害者
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Number of troops and people who died in this battle, and casualties of the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒れた魔人
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fallen demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒れた著名な英雄
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fallen notable heroes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各地を蹂躙し圧倒的な力を持っていた魔軍は次々と降参した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army, which had ravaged various regions with overwhelming power, surrendered one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍、まだ人類に負けてない俺達は圧勝しているんだと戦う馬鹿を殴り飛ばし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon generals who haven't yet lost to humanity, beating up fools who say we are overwhelmingly winning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いは終わったんだよ、大将ケイブリスが敗れたんだ。俺達の負けだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle is over. Commander Cavebris has been defeated. We have lost.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのひ弱な人間どもに負けたんだ。たいしたもんだぜ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We lost to those weak humans. Impressive, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついに人類が魔軍に勝った瞬間である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the moment when humanity finally won against the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 藤原石丸、ＭＭルーン、かっての英雄達がなし得なかった事をついにランスが成し遂げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fujihara Ishimaru, MM Rune, and past heroes could not achieve this, but Lance finally did.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ファンファーレみたいなノリでかっこよく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a cool tone like a fanfare.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＡＬＩＣＥの部屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ALICE's room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類側が勝つ動乱が収まったのを見て、天使ＡＬＩＣＥは不快と感じるだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing the turmoil calm with humanity's victory, the angel ALICE likely feels displeased.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か対策を取らねばと思っていたらクルックーだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kruukoo thought something needed to be done, but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不思議な事に天使ＡＬＩＣＥはニッコリしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interestingly, the angel ALICE is smiling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーは何か不吉な物を感じる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kruukoo senses something ominous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （これは、この後の魔王暴走が分かっていたから、楽しみはこれからだと思っている）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (This is because she knows the Demon King's rampage will happen after this and thinks the excitement is just beginning.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空飛ぶランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The flying Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんがお迎えしてくれる、おつかれさまでした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta-san welcomes you, thank you for your hard work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうなされますか、お食事ですが、お風呂も用意出来ています、またご希望な方を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What would you like? Meals are ready, and a bath is prepared. Please also choose your preference.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指名して頂けたら・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you would designate someone...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな、まずはお前だー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's see, first you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まいったなぁ、俺様、本当に世界の全てを支配してしまったぜ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm beaten, I've truly ended up ruling the entire world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、すごいです。パチパチ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Lance, amazing. *clap clap*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私も微細ながらお手伝いさせて頂いた結果ですよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s the result of my small contributions as well, isn’t it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あほか、お前は関係無い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you stupid? It's nothing to do with you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルと和やかなシーン（この後、悲劇が来るので）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A peaceful scene with Silk (because a tragedy comes after this).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さて・・これからどうするかな、やる事なくなっちまったか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then... what should I do from here? I’ve run out of things to do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前に駄目と言われましたけど、私・・ランス様の子供が欲しいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was told no before, but... I want Lance-sama’s child.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いらんと言っているだろうが、まったく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I said I don’t want that, seriously.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まぁいい、１回だけチャンスをやろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, fine. I’ll give you one chance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がんばります。とか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll do my best. Or something like that...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、お前はしねー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, you die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いかん、撤退だ・・と逃げようとするが、あわてて転ぶ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No good, retreat... He tries to run away but panics and falls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぶざまに転ぶ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Falls clumsily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しまった・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、チャンス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, it's your chance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒れたケイブリスに迫った時、誰かが間に入った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When approaching the fallen Cavebris, someone intervened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大元帥ストロガノフが立ち塞がる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Grand Marshal Stroganoff stands in the way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 刺さった剣を引き抜く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pulls out the embedded sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中、プレイヤー側が防御で守りに入って防いだ後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During battle, after the player side defends and protects.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が余命がつきるまで、そうやって守りに入って逃げ切る気かな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you planning to keep defending and escape until my remaining life runs out?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し残念そうな態度がいいかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A slightly disappointed attitude might be good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このあたりは性格に合わせて、語らない方が良さそうだったらカットします
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Around here, depending on the personality, if it seems better not to speak, I will cut it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中、このラウンドの後、倒せなくてもストロガノフは寿命となる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During battle, after this round, even if not defeated, Stroganoff will reach his lifespan limit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くらっ・・どうやら、これが最期になりそうだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... it seems this is going to be my end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が最期の一撃、正々堂々と受け止めてもらいたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want you to receive my final strike fairly and squarely.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフは死んだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff has died.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてケイブリスが本気になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then Cavebris gets serious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス死にます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cavebris dies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後の戦局
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The subsequent state of the battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍と人類の戦いは終わった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The war between the demon army and humanity has ended.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラの指示
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Camilla's instructions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後の戦局
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The subsequent state of the battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍と人類の戦いは終わった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The war between the demon army and humanity has ended.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラの指示
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Camilla's instructions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリスを倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeated the demon Cavebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界地図をバックに情報中心に表示
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Displayed mainly information against the background of the world map.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回の戦いで死んだ兵力、人民の数、魔軍の被害者
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Number of troops and people who died in this battle, and casualties of the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒れた魔人
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fallen demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒れた著名な英雄
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fallen notable heroes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各地を蹂躙し圧倒的な力を持っていた魔軍は次々と降参した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army, which had ravaged various regions with overwhelming power, surrendered one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍、まだ人類に負けてない俺達は圧勝しているんだと戦う馬鹿を殴り飛ばし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon generals who haven't yet lost to humanity, beating up fools who say we are overwhelmingly winning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いは終わったんだよ、大将ケイブリスが敗れたんだ。俺達の負けだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle is over. Commander Cavebris has been defeated. We have lost.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのひ弱な人間どもに負けたんだ。たいしたもんだぜ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We lost to those weak humans. Impressive, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついに人類が魔軍に勝った瞬間である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the moment when humanity finally won against the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 藤原石丸、ＭＭルーン、かっての英雄達がなし得なかった事をついにランスが成し遂げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fujihara Ishimaru, MM Rune, and past heroes could not achieve this, but Lance finally did.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ファンファーレみたいなノリでかっこよく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a cool tone like a fanfare.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＡＬＩＣＥの部屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ALICE's room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類側が勝つ動乱が収まったのを見て、天使ＡＬＩＣＥは不快と感じるだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing the turmoil calm with humanity's victory, the angel ALICE likely feels displeased.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か対策を取らねばと思っていたらクルックーだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kruukoo thought something needed to be done, but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不思議な事に天使ＡＬＩＣＥはニッコリしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interestingly, the angel ALICE is smiling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーは何か不吉な物を感じる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kruukoo senses something ominous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （これは、この後の魔王暴走が分かっていたから、楽しみはこれからだと思っている）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (This is because she knows the Demon King's rampage will happen after this and thinks the excitement is just beginning.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空飛ぶランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The flying Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんがお迎えしてくれる、おつかれさまでした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta-san welcomes you, thank you for your hard work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうなされますか、お食事ですが、お風呂も用意出来ています、またご希望な方を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What would you like? Meals are ready, and a bath is prepared. Please also choose your preference.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指名して頂けたら・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you would designate someone...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな、まずはお前だー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's see, first you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まいったなぁ、俺様、本当に世界の全てを支配してしまったぜ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm beaten, I've truly ended up ruling the entire world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、すごいです。パチパチ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Lance, amazing. *clap clap*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私も微細ながらお手伝いさせて頂いた結果ですよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s the result of my small contributions as well, isn’t it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あほか、お前は関係無い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you stupid? It's nothing to do with you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルと和やかなシーン（この後、悲劇が来るので）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A peaceful scene with Silk (because a tragedy comes after this).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さて・・これからどうするかな、やる事なくなっちまったか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then... what should I do from here? I’ve run out of things to do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前に駄目と言われましたけど、私・・ランス様の子供が欲しいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was told no before, but... I want Lance-sama’s child.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いらんと言っているだろうが、まったく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I said I don’t want that, seriously.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まぁいい、１回だけチャンスをやろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, fine. I’ll give you one chance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がんばります。とか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll do my best. Or something like that...
